title: Blended Arabic Language Instruction: Intensive Short-Term Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Arabic grammar proficiency and ability to engage in daily conversations
context.additional_context: Application of the NQF (National Qualifications Framework) competency-based approach in the South African educational context, integrating Islamic cultural content

learning_goals: Learners can write and deliver a 3-minute or longer situational speech (speech) in Arabic.
Learners will acquire over 150 Arabic vocabulary items using Web 2.0 tools (Quizlet, WordWall, etc.).
Learners will complete one Arabic cultural project through collaboration with team members using digital collaboration tools (Padlet, etc.).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
